name: Hailpath MV
description:
Hailpath MV is a remastered version of the critically acclaimed  Hailpath game.

Now featuring:

-Updated graphics and battle system

-Four poststory quests*

-Wacky characters including (but not limited to) a Magibeast with a passion for dead fish, an immature demon that uses improper grammer, a time-stopping emo, and many more!

-BUNNY GIRLS

-Three different endings to choose from

-MORE BUNNY GIRLS

-Stupid jokes, clever puns, and more pop-culture references than we can count 

-DID WE MENTION THE BUNNY GIRLS???????

-Difficulty adjuster for a casual or hardcore experience

-BUNNY GIRLS OK YEAH ENOUGH JUST PLAY THE GAME BUNNY GIRLS ARE GREAT!!!!!!!! 

*Currently only Wolfish Dreams and Midnight Pulse are done. Wild Wild Oomy and Timeline Equilibrium coming Winter 2020
